bike.description: Full high modulus carbon fiber, Dyad Elite lay-up, shaped-optimized top and down tubes, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, SST tubing diameters, PressFit30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays with post mount disc brakes & 12x142 drop-outs, stainless steel chain stay protector, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Fox 32 Float 29" CTD Evolution Series w/3-position compression & lock-out,15mm axle, air spring compression, rebound adjust, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
Shimano XT 29", Tubeless, 15mm front & 12x142mm rear center-lock hubs, straight-pull spokes
Shimano XT Shadow rear and XT dual pull front
Shimano XT M785 hydraulic disc brakes with Ice-Technology pads & 180mm front/160mm rear RT81 Ice-Technology centerlock rotors
Ritchey Pro 2x bar, 31.8 x 9JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x +/- 5mm rise x 720mm
Ritchey Pro 2 bolt OS, 31.6 x 400mm, with alloy clamp
